title: doc/code.html shows wrong example output
body:
by **rahulrevo**: 
hello.go (http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/hello/hello.go?repo=example) example
output is broken

fmt.Printf uses %z instead of %v

fmt.Printf("Hello, world.  Sqrt(2) = %z\n", newmath.Sqrt(2))

What is the expected output?
Hello, world.  Sqrt(2) = 1.414213562373095

What do you see instead?
Hello, world.  Sqrt(2) = %!z(float64=1.414213562373095)
